remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字符串的值为 "目标不支持多部分文档"。The value of this string is "Target does not support multipart documents".

summary.span: 一个字符串，在对当前 控件的 属性发送了无效数据时用作错误消息。

span.span: A string to use as an error message if invalid data was posted for the current control's property.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字符串的值为 "当前 ObjectList ViewMode 的已发布数据无效。The value of this string is "Invalid posted data for current ObjectList ViewMode. (在 Page_Load 过程中，可能已对 ObjectList 进行数据绑定，并重置 ViewMode。(The ObjectList may have been databound on postback during Page_Load, resetting the ViewMode. 仅当 IsPostBack 为 false 时，才在 Page_Load 中调用 DataBind。 ) "Call DataBind in Page_Load only if IsPostBack is false.)"

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字符串的值为 "当前 ObjectList ViewMode 的已发布数据无效。The value of this string is "Invalid posted data for current ObjectList ViewMode. (在 Page_Load 过程中，可能已对 ObjectList 进行数据绑定，并重置 ViewMode。(The ObjectList may have been databound on postback during Page_Load, resetting the ViewMode. 仅当 IsPostBack 为 false 时，才在 Page_Load 中调用 DataBind。 ) "Call DataBind in Page_Load only if IsPostBack is false.)"
